high level, smart enough to anticipate things before they happen. But all do their best work in the comfort of the pocket. ''It has to be a feel thing,'' Aaron Rodgers said. I think pocket presence is something that you can learn a little bit, but a lot of it is just feeling your way through that, knowing when to stay in there and when to get out. I think I've done a better job over the last season of knowing when to get out and when to hang in there. The 6-2, 225-pound Aaron Rodgers ranked third among quarterbacks and 26th overall in rushing, totaling 356 yards and four touchdowns on 64 carries( 5.6 average). . ''Washington's War'' concluded that ''the purported economic benefits are both minuscule and unachievable and would be more than offset by the high costs of transit service expansion.'' Donald Rumsfeld Ray LaHood claimed that each 1 percent of regional travel shifted from automobile to transit increases regional income about$ 2.9 million( not billion), based on the APTA report.
